# Nitrogen - Client Acquisition & Risk Analysis Platform

---

**Website:** https://nitrogenwealth.com/  
**Category:** Risk Analysis, Client Acquisition & Engagement  
**Description:** Nitrogen (formerly Riskalyze) is an AI-powered advisor software platform providing risk tolerance assessment, investment research, financial planning, and client engagement tools for financial advisors.

---

## Pricing Tiers

| Tier | Monthly Price | Annual Price | Per User Basis | Notes |
|------|---------------|--------------|----------------|-------|
| **AI Risk Center** | N/A | $199/month* | Per user | Base risk & proposal platform |
| **AI Research Center** | N/A | $149/month* | Per user | Investment research & analytics |
| **AI Tax Center** | N/A | $99/month* | Per user | Tax analysis & insights |
| **AI Meeting Center** | N/A | $99/month* | Add-on | Meeting automation & notes |
| **AI Planning Center** | N/A | $99/month* | Add-on | Retirement planning & scenarios |
| **Nitrogen Elite** | N/A | $395/month* | Per user | AI Risk + Research + Planning |
| **Nitrogen Complete** | N/A | $450/month* | Per user | All centers + Firm Controls |
| **Bundle & Save** | Contact Us | Contact Us | Custom | 2+ centers with discount |
| **Enterprise** | Contact Us | Contact Us | Custom | Broker-dealer pricing available |

*Annual term required for pricing shown

### Pricing Notes
- **Annual Term Required:** Pricing shown is for annual commitments
- **Enterprise Pricing:** Custom pricing for broker-dealers and large firms
- **Bundle Discounts:** Available when purchasing 2+ centers
- **Account-Based Pricing:** Option for pricing based on number of accounts vs users
- **Payment:** ACH, credit card, or third-party checks from custodians
- **Discounts Available:** Based on partnerships, industry groups, and firm affiliations
- **Contract Required:** Annual contracts with long-term commitment focus

---

## Key Features

### Core Capabilities
- **Risk Tolerance Questionnaire:** Industry-standard Risk Number® assessment
- **AI Statement Capture:** Automated account statement analysis
- **Proposal Generation:** Professional client proposals
- **Lead Generation Questionnaire:** Prospect risk assessment
- **Portfolio Risk Analysis:** Detailed portfolio risk metrics
- **Stress Tests:** Historical and hypothetical scenario testing
- **Scenario Analysis:** What-if scenario modeling
- **Heatmaps:** Visual risk and performance analysis
- **401k Retirement Plans:** Specialized retirement plan analysis
- **Advisor Marketing Kit:** Pre-built marketing materials
- **IPS Report Elements:** Investment Policy Statement components

### Advanced Features (AI Centers)
- **AI Risk Center:** Risk tolerance, proposals, lead gen, portfolio analysis
- **AI Research Center:** AI-powered discovery, security stats, portfolio analysis
- **AI Tax Center:** Client tax snapshots, visual tax bracket analysis
- **AI Meeting Center:** Smart meeting summaries, CRM integration, compliance notes
- **AI Planning Center:** Retirement maps, income by source, scenario modeling
- **Firm Controls:** Firm-wide oversight and dashboard management

### Enterprise-Only Features
- **White-Label Options:** Custom branding for broker-dealers
- **Advanced Firm Controls:** Organization-wide compliance and oversight
- **Custom Integrations:** Tailored technology stack integrations
- **Volume Pricing:** Enterprise discounts based on scale
- **Dedicated Support:** Priority implementation and support

### Limitations
- **Annual Contracts Required:** Must commit to annual term for standard pricing
- **Enterprise Focus:** Platform designed for advisory firms, not individuals
- **Complex Pricing:** Multiple centers with add-on structure
- **Contract Commitment:** Long-term focus with renewal considerations

---

## Add-On Products & Services

### AI Meeting Center
**What it does:** Automates meeting notes and maintains client engagement records
**Key Features:** Smart meeting summaries, CRM/calendar integration, compliance-ready notes, editable format
**Pricing:** $99/month (add-on to any center)
**Use Cases:** Advisors wanting to streamline client meeting documentation

### AI Planning Center
**What it does:** Models risk capacity, time horizons, and retirement probability
**Key Features:** Retirement map & reporting, income by source, dynamic retirement scenarios
**Pricing:** $99/month (add-on to any center)
**Use Cases:** Advisors focused on retirement planning and income modeling

### Firm Controls
**What it does:** Firm-wide oversight and unified dashboard management
**Key Features:** Advisor-defined household integration, unified risk dashboard, compliance oversight
**Pricing:** Included in Nitrogen Complete, available as add-on
**Use Cases:** Multi-advisor firms needing centralized oversight

---

## Integration Overview

**Total Integrations:** 25+ partners (custodians, technology platforms, CRM)

Nitrogen integrates seamlessly with existing advisor technology stack, enabling Risk Number integration across wealth tech solutions.

### Key Integrations (7 Detailed)

#### 1. Schwab (Custodian)
- **Type:** Native / API
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Integrates Risk Number with Schwab accounts and proposals
- **Data synced:** Account data, positions, proposals
- **Setup complexity:** Easy (via Nitrogen platform)
- **Limitations:** Schwab advisor services account required
- **Documentation:** https://nitrogenwealth.com/integrations/

#### 2. Fidelity (Custodian)
- **Type:** Native / API
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Risk Number integration with Fidelity platform
- **Data synced:** Account holdings, portfolio data
- **Setup complexity:** Easy (account linking)
- **Limitations:** Fidelity institutional relationship needed
- **Documentation:** https://nitrogenwealth.com/integrations/

#### 3. TD Ameritrade (Custodian)
- **Type:** Native / API
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Integration with TD Ameritrade Institutional platform
- **Data synced:** Account data, portfolio information
- **Setup complexity:** Easy (OAuth connection)
- **Limitations:** TD Ameritrade institutional account required
- **Documentation:** https://nitrogenwealth.com/integrations/

#### 4. Pershing (Custodian)
- **Type:** Native / API
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Integration with Pershing's clearing and custody platform
- **Data synced:** Account data, holdings, positions
- **Setup complexity:** Medium (requires Pershing relationship)
- **Limitations:** Pershing clearing relationship required
- **Documentation:** https://nitrogenwealth.com/integrations/

#### 5. Orion (Portfolio Management)
- **Type:** Native / API
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Risk Number integration with Orion portfolio accounting
- **Data synced:** Portfolio data, performance, account information
- **Setup complexity:** Medium (Orion subscription required)
- **Limitations:** Orion platform subscription required
- **Documentation:** https://nitrogenwealth.com/integrations/

#### 6. Redtail (CRM)
- **Type:** Native / API
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Risk Number integration with Redtail CRM
- **Data synced:** Client data, contact information, account associations
- **Setup complexity:** Easy (OAuth connection)
- **Limitations:** Redtail subscription required
- **Documentation:** https://nitrogenwealth.com/integrations/

#### 7. Black Diamond (SS&C)
- **Type:** Native / API
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Portfolio analytics integration with Black Diamond
- **Data synced:** Portfolio data, performance, risk metrics
- **Setup complexity:** Medium (Black Diamond subscription)
- **Limitations:** Black Diamond platform required
- **Documentation:** https://nitrogenwealth.com/integrations/

### Other Partners & Integrations
- **Custodians:** Apex Clearing, TradePMR, Interactive Brokers
- **CRM:** Salesforce, Wealthbox, MoneyGuide
- **Portfolio Management:** Addepar, Envestnet, Tamarac
- **Financial Planning:** Right Capital, eMoney, MoneyGuidePro
- **Risk/Analytics:** Morningstar, Riskalyze (legacy)
- **Model Portfolios:** BlackRock, State Street, WisdomTree
- **Technology:** Zapier, API connections for custom integrations

- Enterprise customers get higher limits

- API tokens for custom integrations
- Webhook signatures for event-based integrations

## Evaluation Notes

### Pros (5+ items)
1. **Industry-Leading Risk Platform:** Risk Number® is industry-standard tool
2. **AI-Powered Features:** Modern AI integration across all centers
3. **Comprehensive Platform:** Risk, research, planning, tax, and meeting tools
4. **Extensive Integrations:** 25+ technology partners
5. **Proven ROI:** Advisors report $1M+ AUM growth within 90 days
6. **High Prospect Close Rate:** 94% increase reported by 1,000+ AUM firms
7. **42 Industry Awards:** Fast Company, WealthManagement.com, Investment News
8. **30,000+ Advisors:** Trusted by large advisor community
9. **Enterprise Features:** Strong for broker-dealers and large firms
10. **Client Engagement Focus:** Interactive tools for client meetings

### Cons (4+ items)
1. **Annual Contracts Required:** Must commit to annual terms
2. **Complex Pricing Structure:** Multiple centers with add-on model
3. **Higher Price Point:** Premium pricing vs some competitors
4. **Enterprise Focus:** May be overkill for solo advisors
5. **Contract Commitment:** Long-term focus with renewal considerations
6. **Less Portfolio Analytics:** More risk-focused than Kwanti

### Alternatives (with brief comparisons)
1. **Kwanti:** Better for pure portfolio analytics and proposals (see Kwanti profile)
2. **Riskalyze (legacy):** Original risk platform, less comprehensive than Nitrogen
3. **Morningstar:** More traditional research and analytics
4. **Income Lab:** Better for retirement income planning (see Income Lab profile)
5. **Black Diamond:** More comprehensive portfolio accounting

### Use Cases: "Ideal For"
- **Advisors Needing Risk Analysis:** Industry-leading Risk Number platform
- **Client Acquisition Focus:** Strong prospect conversion tools
- **Multi-Center Needs:** Advisors wanting risk, research, planning, tax, and meetings
- **Enterprise/Broker-Dealer:** Scalable platform with firm controls
- **Advisors with 25+ Staff:** Volume pricing and enterprise features
- **Technology-Forward Firms:** AI-powered features and modern interface

### Use Cases: "Not Ideal For"
- **Solo Advisors on Budget:** Higher pricing may not fit
- **Portfolio Analytics Only:** Kwanti may be better for pure analytics
- **Retirement Income Focus:** Income Lab may be better for retirement planning
- **Low-Volume Advisors:** May not need full platform capabilities
- **Short-Term Commitments:** Annual contracts required

### Key Differentiators (5 items)
1. **Risk Number®:** Industry-standard risk tolerance assessment tool
2. **AI-Powered Platform:** Modern AI integration across all product centers
3. **Client Meeting Tools:** Smart meeting notes and compliance features
4. **Proven Growth Metrics:** Documented AUM growth and close rate improvements
5. **42 Industry Awards:** Extensive industry recognition and validation
